title: 90/127/EEC: Council Decision of 12 March 1990 authorizing the United Kingdom to apply a measure derogating from Articles 5 (8) and 21 (1) (a) of the Sixth Directive (77/388/EEC) on the harmonization of the laws of the Member States relating to turnover taxes Common system of value-added tax: uniform basis of assessment
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 12 March 1990
authorizing the United Kingdom to apply a measure derogating from Articles  5 (8) and 21 (1) (a) of the Sixth Directive (77/388/EEC) on the harmonization of  the laws of the Member States relating to turnover taxes - Common system of value-added tax: uniform basis of assessment
(90/127/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 March 1990.
For the Council
The President
A. REYNOLDS
(1) OJ No L 145, 13. 6. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 226, 3. 8. 1989, p. 21.
